name: Road Rage Mage
description:
Move List

Red Abilities:

  • Combustion: Deals a large amount of damage and delays the enemy.
  • Hot Tar: Applies the “Tarred” status affect on the enemy. If the enemy boosts, then they get delayed.

Blue Abilities:

  • Spark: Deal a small amount of damage to delay the enemy.
  • Boost: Speed ahead by a small amount.

Green Abilities:

  • Nitro Boost: Speed ahead by a large amount.
  • Nitro Shield: Apply “Shielded” status effect to self. If the enemy attacks you, then you boost.

Controls:

Action Selection: MOUSE

Pause: P KEY

How to Play:

Win either by:

  • Speeding beyond the right
  • Delaying the enemy beyond the left
  • Being ahead when the race ends

You have three kinds of abilities:

  • Red,
  • Blue,
  • Green.

Pick one color, and you restrict the kind of abilities you can pick next turn:
